home.title: Volunteer Bank
home.text_1: Do you need help with shopping?
home.text_2: Do you need help with cleaning your laundry?
home.text_3: Create an account, send help request and we will find someone to help you
home.ask: Start looking for help, or go down and find group to join to start helping people
login.title: Login to Volunteer Bank
login.google.helpText: by signing in, you will be redirected to the Google consent form to sign in with your google account
login.google.error.message: sorry! we weren't able to log you in. please try again later!
login.google.error.banner: sorry! we weren't able to log you in. please try again later!
filter.title: Find people who need your help
filter.help.text: Change the buttons to find people by type of help or the language of the person in need
home.map.join: Join to group if you want to help
modal.select: Select one from you team to help with this request
user.profile.error.banner: this user may not exist or we've encountered an error, pleas try again later
user.profile.creat.request.success: your help request created, just wait for response
user.profile.creat.request.error: something went wrong, ...please try again later
user.profile.input.title: Title
user.profile.name: Name
user.profile.auth: If you belong to a recognized organization or can verify your identity, contact us to verify your account,By authenticating your account, you can create a group to start adding new members and assigning them to help those in need, and where you can start collecting donations.
user.profile.help.requests.empty: User doesn't have any help request yet!
user.profile.help.requests.title: Your Help Requests
user.profile.help.requests.help.text: This section highlights the help requests you have made
group.profile.name: Name
group.join.error: something went wrong try again later
group.join.error.language: you must choose one language at last, or insert one
geo.error: something went wrong try again later
geo.browser.support: Your browser does not support Geo location
geo.error.save: something went wrong, try again later
geo.warning: You need to insert your location to start asking for help
geo.form.title: OR insert this data
create.group.title: Create Group
